author: yahoo
title: Kansas City Chiefs fans deaths: Autopsy reports complete, suppressed by ongoing death investigation
text:
Fox News Kansas City Chiefs fans deaths: Autopsy reports complete, suppressed by ongoing death investigation Christina Coulter April 25, 2024 at 7:18 PM · 5 min read 57 Link Copied Read full article Kansas City Chiefs fans deaths: Autopsy reports complete, suppressed by ongoing death investigation
Autopsy and toxicology reports are complete for three Kansas City Chiefs fans found mysteriously dead in their friend's snowy backyard earlier this year - but their results have been suppressed in light of an ongoing investigation.
Harrington, 37, Clayton McGeeney, 36, and Ricky Johnson, 38, were discovered frozen and dead behind their longtime friend Jordan Willis' home on Jan. 9, two days after they were all last seen alive inside the house watching the Chiefs play the Los Angeles Chargers.
A representative from Frontier Forensics Midwest LLC told Fox News Digital that their autopsies and toxicology reports had been completed in "late January," but said that only the Platte County Prosecuting Attorney's Office could release their results. The latter agency could not immediately be reached for comment.
Preliminary results were shared orally with the men's family members by Kansas City Police Department detectives in early February - THC, cocaine and lethal levels of fentanyl were reportedly found in the three men's systems, Fox News Digital previously reported .
KANSAS CITY CHIEFS FANS DEATHS: 'WALTER WHITE NARRATIVE' ABOUT PARTY HOST IS ‘OUT OF CONTROL,’ SOURCE SAYS
David Harrington, Clayton McGeeney and Ricky Johnson were found dead outside their friend's Kansas City home on Jan. 9, 2024.
"If there was a person that knew what was in whatever they consumed that night and didn't warn anybody, they should be held accountable," Jennifer Marquez, David Harrington's mother, told Fox 4 . "That's my fear, it won't happen... it's so hard not knowing anything - like not hearing anything."
READ ON THE FOX NEWS APP
Ricky Johnson Sr., Johnson's father, told Fox News Digital that the Kansas City Police Department had turned his son's case over to their drug task force .
"I think they need to arrest the guy and get him to talk," the elder Johnson said on Thursday. "My attorney told me to give more time [for police] to finish the investigation - [I'm] not pleased but I'll wait a little longer."
KANSAS CITY CHIEFS FANS' DEATHS: FAMILIES AT ODDS THREATEN LAWSUITS AGAINST EACH OTHER
HIV scientist Jordan Willis, 38, checked himself into a rehab center after his three friends were found dead in his backyard Jan. 9, 2024.
A source close to homeowner Jordan Willis shared the frustration of the deceased men's families:
"He is waiting just like anyone else until this investigation concludes," the source said on Thursday. "The limbo has been frustrating and he feels like he can't really start to heal until we have some kind of resolution here."
"This has been so traumatic for him and he's still trying to cope with the loss of his friends, as well as the loss of living anonymously," the source continued.
Fox 4 also reported that the attorney of Alex Lee, a fifth man who spent time at Willis' house with the men in their final hours had been contacted by the prosecutor's office in the case.
KANSAS CITY CHIEFS FANS DEATHS: DRUGS IN MEN'S SYSTEMS SHOW 'THERE'S MORE TO THE STORY,' FAMILY SAYS
Jon Harrington is pictured left along with his son David. In response preliminary toxicology findings showing cocaine and fentanyl in Johnson, McGeeney and Harrington's systems, the elder Harrington told News Nation that "somebody gave them something that would kill them."
In January, representatives with Frontier Forensics told Fox News Digital that the men's autopsy and toxicology results would be available in six to ten weeks.
"There are no updates at this time," Kansas City Police Department Sergeant Phil DiMartino said on Wednesday. "This case remains active and ongoing. Investigators continue to follow all leads. Our agency remains in contact and continues to work with the Platte County Prosecutor’s office for review of any applicable charges. The results of an autopsy report are not publicly available in an ongoing investigation. "
The police department has said there is no foul play suspected in their deaths, telling Fox News Digital that they are "100 percent not being investigated as homicide[s]."
However, the men's loved ones have come forward with theories that Willis played an active role in their demise.
PRELIMINARY TOXICOLOGY RESULTS BACK FOR KANSAS CITY CHIEFS FANS FOUND FROZEN TO DEATH
An exterior view of the backyard and porch of Jordan Willis’s home in Kansas City, Missouri, on Friday, Jan. 26, 2024. The bodies of Willis’ three friends – Ricky Johnson, Clayton McGeeney, and David Harrington – were found in Willis’ backyard, with one body found on the porch, on Jan. 9, 2024, two days after attending a Kansas City Chiefs watch party at the home.
All three families are considering wrongful death lawsuits , Fox News Digital previously reported.
Previously, Harrington's father told Fox News Digital that he and his son's mother were "convinced that Jordan Willis played a part in this somehow" and they "just [hadn't] figured out how yet."
Johnson's mother previously told Fox News Digital that she feared Willis had "concocted something and gave it to all three men," while the 38-year-old's father said he "[believed Willis] drugged them, dragged them outside and waited two days to call police."
Willis' attorney, John Picerno, has said that his client was unaware that his friends needed help in his backyard, and he had no idea that they were dead in his backyard until police arrived there on the evening of Jan. 9.
McGeeney's fiancée called authorities to the scene after she broke onto Willis' property following unsuccessful attempts to reach Willis and unanswered knocks on his door. She found one of the men's bodies outside.
KANSAS CITY CHIEFS FANS' DEATHS: VICTIMS' FAMILIES AT ODDS OVER 'ANGRY' SPECULATION, LAWYER SAYS
Family and friends of Clayton McGeeney, left, David Harrington, center, and Ricky Johnson are clamoring for answers after the three men inexplicably died in freezing temperatures outside their friend's Kansas City, Missouri, home.
The source close to Willis previously told Fox News Digital that the HIV scientist, who has since moved out of his Kansas City home and spent a stint in a rehab facility, "has been left with no choice but to consider slander and defamation suits against these families, friends and significant others who have baselessly accused him in a smear campaign on every public forum willing to give them a platform to blame and point fingers."
CLICK HERE FOR THE FOX NEWS APP
The source said Willis "looks forward to having the opportunity to be able to clear his name."
Original article source: Kansas City Chiefs fans deaths: Autopsy reports complete, suppressed by ongoing death investigation

title: The Worst Advice We've Ever Seen About Mazda 2 Spare Key Mazda 2 Spare Key - Q2A
text: Remember Register Questions Unanswered Tags Users Ask a Question Welcome to Q2A, where you can ask questions and receive answers from other members of the community. The Worst Advice We've Ever Seen About Mazda 2 Spare Key Mazda 2 Spare Key 0 votes How to Replace a Dead Mazda 6 Key Fob The Mazda 6 has many features. One of it is a keyfob which can lock or unlock the car. However, like all things, the fob can be damaged or worn out. It's easy and inexpensive to change the battery in your Mazda 6. All you need is a small flat-head screwdriver and an new CR2025 battery. How do I program a key fob for the Mazda6 Unlocking your mazda cx-5 Key fob replacement cost 's doors remotely is one of the most useful features you can do. This will make it easier for you to get your kids in the car to get to school or bring groceries home after work. However, if your fob doesn't work it can be a hassle. There are a few easy steps you can follow to fix the issue and get it to work. Your mazda spare key cost 6 has a remote control key, or fob, that connects to the car's onboard system to open the doors and start the engine. It's an excellent convenience, however it could be risky if you lose or get the key. It is important to understand how the key fob operates so you can make sure that it's secure and not been tampered with. A beep is heard when the ignition key is turned on or the engine is running. The operation indicator light will also flash. Look up the warning message that appears in the instrument cluster. The first thing you will require to do is to remove the metal key from the fob. To do this, press the small button at the back of your fob until the key pops out. Make use of a flathead for prying the case open starting from one side, and then the other. Be careful not to scratch the rubber ring that holds the battery in place. Replace the battery with a brand new one after taking it out. Reattach the case. How to replace the battery in the Mazda 6 key fob If you discover that your Mazda key fob is not working as it should, the battery may require replacement. It's a simple fix you can perform yourself in Cicero. All you require is a flathead screwdriver and electrical tape. Then you can get back on the roads in your Mazda. Press the button on the back to take out the auxiliary piece of metal. Now, you will see the slot on either side of the key fob's case. Then, gently pull the case open on the other side. Be careful not to scratch the rubber ring on which the battery is placed on. Once the case is opened, take off the old batteries. Place the new battery on the ring with the positive (+ side) facing up. Reassemble the case, and attach both sides of the fob. After both halves are secured you should hear a clicking sound. Be sure to purchase the appropriate replacement battery (CR2025 3 Volt) from your local Rio Rancho hardware store or auto parts shop. Replace the rubber ring that sits on the battery. If it's damaged, we recommend getting a new one. You can buy this from our University Mazda Parts Department. How can I replace the chip in a Mazda 6 key fob If you own a Mazda 6 key fob or transponder flip key with an unresponsive battery, there's an easy method to start it up without having to pay for the services of locksmiths or dealers. The key fob contains a code that allows it communicate with the computer inside your car. This code is an individual identifier for the fob, which allows it to open doors and even start your car. This code is printed on the sticker inside your ignition as well as on the reverse of your key fob. Keep this key code in a safe place in case you need it. You'll save time and money. Also, if you have the original Mazda key for your vehicle, it will probably have this code on it as well. This code is used to programme the key so that the car can recognize it as a transponder chip or smart key fob. When you are looking to get a new mazda 2 key replacement cost 6 key made, make sure you note down the year, make and model of your car on an article of paper. This will help the locksmith or dealer verify the exact year, make and model, so that they can determine whether you require a transponder chip, smart remote, or regular metal key. You will also need to show proof of ownership (such as the title, registration or insurance card) for your vehicle. How can I replace the RFID chip on a Mazda 6 key fob Mazda key fobs also known as Mazda chip keys or mazda car keys replacements transponder keys are equipped with an anti-theft feature called an RFID (Radio Frequency Identification) chip within them. The chip emits a specific signal when the button is moved. The signal is picked up by a receiver in the car, which activates it. Without this chip, even a perfect copy of the key will not start it. What happens if the key fob chip in your vehicle fails? If you have your metal key, you can take off the cover using the help of a screwdriver (it may be a challenge) or pliers, and then remove the chip. Attach it to the ignition lock by gluing it onto some tape. This will allow you to open the doors and turn the engine while you wait for a replacement. The counter for Lock Surgeon's automotive solutions is stocked with mazda 6 wheel lock key replacement key remotes as well as Mazda proximity smart keys. These keys are ready to be programmed, cut or duplicated for all models and years. We can program and cut Mazda keys at your workplace, at home or at any of Lock Surgeon's locations. Call, email or stop by. We have a wide range of automotive products, including car alarms. author: VivaBem
title: SUCO de BATATA-DOCE, LIMÃO e GENGIBRE serve para que? Veja benefícios e como fazer
text:
SUCO de BATATA-DOCE, LIMÃO e GENGIBRE serve para que? Veja benefícios e como fazer
Por VivaBem
Benefícios gerais do suco: O suco de batata-doce com limão e gengibre, aliado a uma alimentação saudável, oferece diversas vantagens para o organismo.
iStock
Batata-doce: Rica em carboidratos saudáveis, fibras, vitaminas (A, E, C, K, complexo B) e minerais como zinco, cálcio, ferro e potássio.
iStock
Contribuições da batata-doce: Ajuda na saciedade, ganho muscular, saúde intestinal, melhora da visão, imunidade, glicemia e pressão arterial.
iStock
Propriedades do limão: Rico em vitamina C, cálcio, ferro, fósforo e magnésio, com benefícios digestivos e para a saúde cardiovascular.
joannatkaczuk/Getty Images/iStockphoto
Benefícios do limão: Turbina a imunidade, melhora a digestão, reduz o risco de AVC, neutraliza radicais livres e alivia sintomas respiratórios.
ALEAIMAGE/iStock
Propriedades do gengibre: Antioxidante e anti-inflamatório, com minerais como magnésio e potássio, e apenas 80 kcal por 100 g.
iStock
Benefícios do gengibre: Controla o diabetes, reduz cólicas menstruais, combate infecções, melhora digestão e alivia sintomas respiratórios.
the_burtons/Getty Images
Receita do suco: Bata batata-doce, limão, gengibre e água no liquidificador. Opcional: adicionar maçã e gelo para sabor e nutrição.
Raphael Dib
Modo de preparo: Higienize e descasque os ingredientes, fatie a batata-doce, bata tudo no liquidificador até obter uma mistura homogênea.
Getty Images
Contraindicações: Consulte um médico antes de consumir, especialmente se tiver condições como cálculos renais, pressão alta, problemas gastrointestinais ou estiver grávida.
iStock
Para saber mais, acesse VivaBem.
Raphael Dib

author: Daniel Borrego
title: Estos son los planes que no te puedes perder si es estás en agosto en Madrid: verbenas populares y noches bajo las estrellas - Infobae
text:
Puerta del Sol, en Madrid (Shutterstock España). Agosto transforma Madrid en una ciudad inusualmente apacible y llena de oportunidades para descubrir su lado más auténtico y cercano. Mientras muchos residentes hacen las maletas rumbo a las costas, la capital despliega una programación veraniega vibrante , salpicada de fiestas populares, cultura al aire libre y experiencias únicas que seducen a quienes deciden quedarse o visitarla en pleno verano. Esta combinación de ambiente relajado y oferta cultural diversifica la manera de vivir Madrid en agosto, cuando sus calles y plazas rebosan planes para todos los gustos.
Fiestas populares de agosto: tradición y alegría en todos los barrios El mes de agosto en Madrid no sería el mismo sin sus legendarias verbenas y celebraciones patronales. Estas fiestas, repartidas por barrios históricos, llenan la ciudad de mantones, claveles, música y ambiente familiar desde principios hasta mediados de mes. Todo arranca con la festividad de San Cayetano en Lavapiés, donde la plaza Vara del Rey acoge conciertos y actividades, seguida de San Lorenzo , con bailes y celebraciones en las plazas de Nelson Mandela, Cabestreros y Arturo Barea. El ciclo culmina con la esperada Virgen de la Paloma , que convierte la carrera de San Francisco y la plaza de los Carros en escenarios irrepetibles, mientras los conciertos en las Vistillas animan las noches más calurosas.
Lope a la fresca: poesía y arte en las noches veraniegas
Casa Museo Lope de Vega, en Madrid (Web del Museo). Quienes buscan planes diferentes pueden acudir a las sesiones de Lope a la fresca , organizadas por la Casa Museo de Lope de Vega durante todos los viernes de agosto. En el jardín del museo, ubicado en pleno centro histórico, las noches se visten de poesía, música en directo y encuentros teatrales que honran la tradición de “salir a la fresca” y compartir vivencias bajo la brisa nocturna madrileña. El acceso es libre hasta completar aforo y la propuesta abarca desde charlas sosegadas hasta la declamación de versos, en un entorno tan literario como acogedor.
Perseidas: las lágrimas de San Lorenzo iluminan el cielo de agosto Uno de los fenómenos astronómicos más esperados del verano es la lluvia de estrellas conocida como las Perseidas, que suele alcanzar su punto álgido sobre el 12 de agosto. Bajo las condiciones idóneas, lejos de la contaminación lumínica, es posible observar entre 50 y 100 meteoros por hora en el cielo madrileño. El Observatorio Astronómico Nacional prevé el máximo a partir de las 22:00 horas, permitiendo a curiosos y aficionados disfrutar del espectáculo de la naturaleza desde cualquier rincón de la ciudad.
Veranos de la Villa 2025: la gran cita cultural del estío Los Veranos de la Villa representan el corazón de la programación de agosto en Madrid. Este festival multidisciplinar moviliza la ciudad con talleres, conciertos, exposiciones , proyecciones y espectáculos para todos los públicos. Entre las propuestas destacan rutas olfativas para explorar Madrid de forma distinta, teatro en el Circo Price o música al aire libre en el Conde Duque. Además, el “Cine Caliente” en el Parque de la Bombilla, y festivales musicales como los conciertos de Yerai Cortés, Pasión Vega o la fiesta Stereo Party, con bandas de los años 90, mantienen viva la energía colectiva. La mayoría de las actividades son gratuitas o con precios muy accesibles, haciendo del verano una oportunidad especial para redescubrir la ciudad.
REUTERS/Ana Beltran REFILE - QUALITY REPEAT Museo Banksy: arte contemporáneo en estado puro
Museo Banksy de Madrid (Web del museo). Otra novedad del verano es el Museo Banksy , un espacio permanente y monográfico dedicado al inconfundible artista urbano. El museo alberga 170 réplicas de sus obras más conocidas en 1.500 metros cuadrados de exposición interactiva. Su colección permite navegar por el universo combativo, irónico y reivindicativo de Banksy, posicionando a Madrid como uno de los grandes referentes europeos del arte contemporáneo y alternativo.
Buenas Noches 2025: festival cultural a la fresca en Hoyo de Manzanares A pocos kilómetros de la capital, la localidad de Hoyo de Manzanares se suma también a la oferta estival gracias a su festival de artes escénicas Buenas Noches 2025 . Del 12 de julio al 23 de agosto, la plaza Cervantes será escenario de espectáculos gratuitos que abarcan desde la música clásica y el jazz hasta el flamenco, la danza y las artes circenses. Este evento convierte las veladas del municipio en encuentros llenos de cultura y convivencia bajo las estrellas.
Cines de verano: noches refrescantes bajo las estrellas
Autocine Madrid Race, en Madrid Para quienes buscan un plan relajado y familiar, los cines de verano son una de las joyas de agosto en Madrid. Basta con esperar a que baje el sol y acudir a las proyecciones al aire libre de CinePlaza en Matadero, los grandes éxitos del Parque de la Bombilla o las funciones comentadas del Cine Caliente. Incluso el Autocine Madrid ofrece una experiencia vintage pensada para todas las edades y gustos, perfecta para combatir las altas temperaturas y despedir el día entre risas y palomitas.
El concierto sorpresa de los Veranos de la Villa: misterio y música Una de las citas más esperadas de agosto es el concierto secreto de los Veranos de la Villa. Como ya es tradición, el 14 de agosto se revelará en el Centro Cultural Conde Duque el protagonista de un directo único cuya identidad se mantiene en secreto hasta su aparición en el escenario. Las entradas para este evento se pueden descargar gratuitamente desde el 11 de agosto, añadiendo un aura de expectación y sorpresa inigualable a la programación estival.
Festival de San Lorenzo: música y patrimonio en la sierra La sierra madrileña también vibra en agosto con el Festival de San Lorenzo, que reúne trece espectáculos musicales en enclaves patrimoniales como el Teatro Auditorio , la Capilla de Nuestra Señora de Abantos, la Lonja del Monasterio o el Teatro La Antigua Mina en Zarzalejo. Propuestas como “1 piano y 2000 velas” de David Gómez, el Ballet flamenco de Madrid con la Orquesta Ciudad de Alcalá o el Living Room Room de Fátima Miranda muestran la rica diversidad artística de la región.
Esta es la historia de San Isidro Labrador: cinco milagros, sus restos están en una iglesia de Madrid y tiene una moneda de Enrique IV en la garganta. Festival Escenas de Verano: cultura en todos los rincones de la región El Festival Escenas de Verano complementa el calendario con más de 250 actividades de danza, teatro, cine y circo que se despliegan en plazas y espacios de toda la Comunidad de Madrid. Esta apuesta garantiza que la cultura y el entretenimiento lleguen a localidades grandes y pequeñas, democratizando el acceso a las artes en los meses de mayor calma y calor.
topics: Arts, Culture and Entertainment->customs and tradition

author: VNExplorer
title: ‘Oito Ducati não deviam ser permitidos; não é bom para o Mundial’ – Massimo Rivola
text:
‘Oito Ducati não deviam ser permitidos; não é bom para o Mundial’ – Massimo Rivola
A Ducati é o construtor mais representado no atual pelotão de MotoGP, tendo oito motos: as duas da equipa satélite e seis distribuídas por três equipas satélite. Por isso mesmo, tem muito mais possibilidades de testar e experimentar soluções inclusive durante os Grandes Prémios, o que só favorece uma Desmosedici GP já bastante veloz. Massimo Rivola, diretor-executivo da Aprilia Racing, contesta a grande vastidão de Ducati que há no MotoGP.
O dirigente disse citado pelo site SPEEDWEEK.com que a RS-GP irá melhorar, mas há depois que ver o que isso representa em relação aos restantes construtores: ‘A moto do próximo ano tem de ser melhor, e não há motivo para duvidar disso. Portanto, a questão será: o quão melhor irá ficar a KTM, o quanto irá melhorar a Ducati, com a vantagem que já teve? E a Yamaha. O que eles mostraram em Sepang foi um pouco preocupante. Eles vão receber concessões e vamos ter de os deixar fazer isso, mas pareço um pouco idiota, porque – por que é que faríamos isso? Mas o maior problema é que temos oito Ducati super velozes no pelotão’.
A Aprilia quer ser pelo menos o segundo construtor na hierarquia, mas Rivola realçou que com oito motos em pista a Ducati tem muitas vantagens no desenvolvimento e preparação da moto. O italiano admitiu que não devia ser permitido ter tantas motos: ‘Não quero ofender ninguém, porque eles o fizeram e nós não. O problema é que não deviam ser permitidos. É o que digo todos os dias a Carmelo [Ezpeleta, diretor-executivo da Dorna]. Não digo que eles não estão certos. Eles fizeram-no, investiram muito – e bem. Mas não é bom para o Mundial’.
O conteúdo ‘Oito Ducati não deviam ser permitidos; não é bom para o Mundial’ – Massimo Rivola aparece primeiro em Motorcycle Sports.

title: 大华股份（002236）3月6日10点6分触及涨停板_股票频道_证券之星
text:
